item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents.

item.title: Courses
item.description: LEL students can take the following research methods and statistics courses.

item.title: Learning resources
item.description: There are several resources you can use to teach yourself data analysis and statistics skills, depending on your level.

item.title: Research Skills
item.description: Plan Research questions and hypotheses The online course Constructing a hypothesis, from the PPLS Practical Research Skills website, teaches you “how to operationalise your research question into an informative and falsifiable hypothesis”.

item.title: Support
item.description: We have different support channels for students who are writing their dissertation, PhD students, and researchers/staff.
